subject: Football
Super Bowl
lead_paragraph: Even if the New England Patriots complete an unprecedented 19-0 sweep, they will still trail the Vince Lombardi Packers of the ’60s and the Chuck Noll Steelers of the ’70s.
snippet: Even if the New England Patriots complete an unprecedented 19-0 sweep, they will still trail the Vince Lombardi Packers of the ’60s and the Chuck Noll Steelers of the ’70s.
